comments:
Description:
Change JAVA_HOME and path(environment variables) from jre to jdk will cause 
nullpointexception when transfer to master page editor.

Steps to reproduce:
1.Set JAVA_HOME and path to jre
2.Get the latest BIRT build and install
3.Open eclipse and create a new report
4.Save the report and preview in HTML
5.Close the eclipse
6.Set JAVA_HOME and path to jdk
7.Open eclipse
8.Open any report and transfer to master page editor

Expected result:
No errors.

Actual result:
java.lang.NullPointerException

at

Change(LayoutEditor.java:200)

etSelected(LayoutEditor.java:142)

.run(ButtonPaneComposite.java:154)

This should be have nothing to do with precompile. Please re-test it using new
build including the precompile see whether reproducable or not.

This should be have nothing to do with precompile. Please re-test it using new
build including the precompile see whether reproducable or not.

The scr is reproducible in the latest build. It seems as if the latest build 
haven't done precompile.
Sorry,the latest build has included the precompile but the issue still exists.
The report created in step3 must include dataset
Because the bug is caused by other reasons so close it and submit a new scr
